net.hudup.core.data

Class Pair

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.data.Pair
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Pair
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a pair of key and value. Key is integer and value is double number.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • findIndexOfLessThan

        public static int findIndexOfLessThan(double value,
                                      java.util.List<Pair> pairs)
        This static method finds the index of the first pair (in the specified list of pairs) whose value is less than the specified value.
        Parameters:
        value - specified value.
        pairs - specified list of pairs.
        Returns:
        index of the first pair (in the specified list of pairs) whose value is less than the specified value.

      • toPairList

        public static java.util.List<Pair> toPairList(RatingVector vRating)
        This static method converts the specified rating vector into the list of pairs. Each pair contains a rating value together the field ID (item ID or user ID).
        Parameters:
        vRating - specified rating vector.
        Returns:
        List of Pair (s) converted from the specified rating vector.

      • toCategoryPairList

        public static java.util.List<Pair> toCategoryPairList(RatingVector vRating,
                                                      Profile profile)
        Firstly, this static method calls method toPairList(RatingVector) to convert the specified rating vector into a pair list L1. Secondly, this method converts category values (nominal values of binary values) of the specified profile into the pair list L2. Finally the returned list is concatenation of L1 and L2.
        Parameters:
        vRating - specified rating vector.
        profile - specified profile.
        Returns:
        List of Pair (s) converted from specified rating vector and specified profile.

      • toPairList

        public static java.util.List<Pair> toPairList(RatingVector vRating,
                                              java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> commonFields)
        This static method converts the specified rating vector into the list of pairs. Each pair contains a rating value together the field ID (item ID or user ID). so that such field ID exists in both the specified rating vector and the specified collection of field IDs.
        Parameters:
        vRating - specified rating vector
        commonFields - specified collection of field IDs.
        Returns:
        List of Pair (s) converted from the specified rating vector with regard to specified collection of field IDs.

      • toPairList

        public static java.util.List<Pair> toPairList(RatingVector vRating,
                                              double filterRatingValue)
        This static method converts the specified rating vector into the list of pairs. Each pair contains a rating value together the field ID (item ID or user ID). so that such rating value is equal to the specified filtering rating value.
        Parameters:
        vRating - specified rating vector.
        filterRatingValue - the specified filtering rating value.
        Returns:
        List of Pair converted from the specified rating vector with regard to the specified filtering rating value.

      • fillRatingVector

        public static void fillRatingVector(RatingVector vRating,
                                    java.util.List<Pair> pairs)
        This method fills in the specified rating vector by keys and values of the specified pair list.
        Parameters:
        vRating - specified rating vector which is output parameter.
        pairs - specified pair list.

      • getKeys

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getKeys(java.util.List<Pair> pairs)
        Getting keys of the specified pair list.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        set of keys.

        Parameters:
        pairs - specified pair list.
        Returns:

      • sort

        public static void sort(java.util.List<Pair> pairList,
                        boolean descending)
        This static method sorts the specified pair list.
        Parameters:
        pairList - specified pair list which is both input and output parameter.
        descending - if true, the specified pair list is sorted according to descending order. Otherwise, it is sorted according ascending order.

      • sort

        public static void sort(java.util.List<Pair> pairList,
                        boolean descending,
                        int maxCount)
        This static method sorts the specified pair list. Later on, the sorted pair list is truncated by the specified maximum count.
        Parameters:
        pairList - specified pair list which is both input and output parameter.
        descending - if true, the specified pair list is sorted according to descending order. Otherwise, it is sorted according ascending order.
        maxCount - specified maximum count. If the number of pairs in the final sorted list is more than this maximum count, this list is truncated so that the number of its elements is equal to this maximum count.
